name: 24K Gold Glowing Gel
ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Aqua (Water), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Niacinamide, Azelaic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Leaf Extract, Ocimum Sanctum (Tulsi) Leaf Extract, Rubia Cordifolia (Manjistha) Root Extract, Emblica Officinalis (Amla) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Sodium PCA, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Menthol, D-Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Disodium EDTA, Natural Fragrance (Herbal-Mint Blend)
benefits_brief:
A modern Ayurvedic blend for instant calm, clarity, and skin renewal.

Product Benefits

Instant Cooling Relief:
Menthol, cucumber, and peppermint extracts deliver a refreshing cooling sensation that calms irritation, redness, and heat-triggered sensitivity.

Balances & Brightens Skin Tone:
Niacinamide and Licorice Root extract visibly reduce dullness, dark spots, and uneven pigmentation for a clearer, radiant complexion.

Fights Acne & Inflammation Naturally:
Azelaic Acid, Neem, and Tulsi extracts work together to purify pores, fight bacterial growth, and soothe breakouts without dryness.

Deep Hydration Without Stickiness:
Aloe Vera, Hyaluronic Acid, and D-Panthenol lock in moisture while keeping the skin light, smooth, and breathable.

Repairs & Strengthens Skin Barrier:
Gotu Kola and Manjistha promote cell renewal, boost collagen synthesis, and enhance natural healing.

Stress-Relief Aromatherapy:
The soft herbal-mint aroma cools both skin and senses, leaving a refreshing, spa-like afterfeel.

Perfect for All Skin Types:
Especially beneficial for oily, acne-prone, and sensitive skin; balances sebum while maintaining hydration.

100% Vegan | Ayurvedic | Free from Parabens, Silicones & Sulphates

Ideal For:

Post-sun exposure or after workouts

Calming irritated, inflamed, or acne-prone skin

Restoring glow after stress or fatigue

Daily hydration during hot & humid seasons

use_cases:
Post-Sun Soothing Gel
Instantly cools and calms skin after sun exposure.
Reduces redness, heat rashes, and tanning discomfort.
Perfect after beach days, outdoor events, or workouts.

Daily Hydration Gel
Lightweight alternative to moisturizer for oily and acne-prone skin.
Keeps skin hydrated without greasiness.
Ideal under makeup or sunscreen for a smooth, matte finish.

After Shave or Wax Relief
Calms irritation and minor inflammation post hair removal.
Prevents bumps and ingrown hairs naturally.

Acne & Redness Control Treatment
Helps fade active breakouts and reduces redness.
Fights post-acne marks with Niacinamide + Azelaic synergy.
Soothes inflammation caused by stress or weather changes.

Post-Treatment Recovery Gel
Perfect after chemical peels, facials, or dermat treatments.
Supports healing and barrier repair while cooling the skin.

Cooling Night Gel
Use as the last step in your night routine for hydration and glow.
Repairs tired, inflamed skin overnight.

After-Workout or Travel Refresh 
Use to calm skin after sweating, gym sessions, or long travel.
Keeps skin bacteria-free and refreshed on the go.

How to Use
Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin.
Gently massage until absorbed.
Use AM & PM or as needed for instant cooling.
Can be layered under sunscreen or moisturizer.

Best Suited For:
Oily, acne-prone, or combination skin
Sensitive or heat-reactive skin
Skin exposed to sun, pollution, or stress

name: 24K Gold Elixir Face Oil Serum
ingredients: Squalane (Olive Derived), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Withania Somnifera (Ashwagandha) Root Extract, Rubia Cordifolia (Manjistha) Root Extract, Centella Asiatica (Gotu Kola) Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Lactic Acid, Mandelic Acid, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Boswellia Carterii (Frankincense) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract (Natural Antioxidant), Natural Fragrance (Botanical Blend).
benefits_brief:
1.	Boosts Natural Radiance & Glow
Powered by Rosehip, Manjistha, and Licorice Extracts, this serum works at a cellular level to revive dull skin and enhance natural luminosity. Organic fruit acids gently renew the surface, giving a visible glow without irritation.
2.	Firms & Tightens the Skin
Enriched with Gotu Kola, Ashwagandha, and Frankincense Oil, it helps boost collagen production and improve elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and early wrinkles for firmer, youthful skin.
3.	Deep Nourishment, Zero Greasiness
The feather-light blend of Squalane, Grapeseed, and Jojoba Oils absorbs instantly, locking in moisture without clogging pores. Skin feels soft, smooth, and hydrated all day.
4.	Reduces Pigmentation & Uneven Tone
Licorice, Manjistha, and Mandelic Acid target sun spots, dullness, and uneven patches to reveal a brighter, even-toned complexion over time.
5.	Strengthens Skin Barrier & Prevents Aging Damage
Pomegranate, Sea Buckthorn, and Vitamin E protect against oxidative stress and environmental damage, fortifying the skin‚Äôs natural defense system.
6.	Soothes Stress & Balances Skin Energy
Infused with pure Geranium, Rose, and Frankincense essential oils, it calms the mind and skin simultaneously, making your skincare ritual a moment of Ayurvedic balance and serenity.
7.	Ayurvedic + Modern Synergy
The perfect fusion of time-tested Ayurvedic botanicals and modern bio-actives that deliver visible results ‚Äî radiant, lifted, youthful-looking skin with every drop.

use_cases:
A weightless fusion of Ayurvedic botanicals and modern actives for timeless glow and firm, youthful skin.
Product Use Cases
Night Repair Elixir

Rejuvenates dull and tired skin overnight.
Boosts collagen and elasticity while you sleep.
Wake up to visibly smoother, plumper, radiant skin.

Morning Glow Booster
Adds a natural, dewy radiance under sunscreen or makeup.
Locks in hydration without greasiness.
Ideal as a primer for a soft, glowing finish.

Anti-Aging Ritual
Firms and tightens skin with Gotu Kola, Ashwagandha & Frankincense.
Reduces the appearance of fine lines and early wrinkles.
Enhances skin‚Äôs bounce and youthful texture with continued use.

Daily Brightening Treatment
Combines Manjistha, Licorice & fruit acids to visibly improve skin tone.
Fades pigmentation and sun dullness.
Delivers a lit-from-within glow with consistent use.

Facial Massage & Gua Sha Oil
Ideal for face yoga or Gua Sha routines.
Promotes lymphatic drainage and blood circulation.
Improves firmness and contours naturally.

Travel or Post-Stress Skin Reviver
Restores skin‚Äôs natural balance after flights, long work hours, or sun exposure.
Provides instant softness and comfort to dehydrated skin.

Mix-in Enhancer
Add 1‚Äì2 drops into your moisturizer or foundation for extra glow.
Enhances hydration and makes makeup blend seamlessly.

How to Use
Warm 2‚Äì3 drops between your palms.
Gently press onto cleansed face and neck.
Use AM and/or PM after toner or essence.
Follow with sunscreen in the morning.

Best For:
Dull, uneven, or mature skin
Fine lines and early aging signs
Skin lacking firmness and natural glow

name: Glow Skin Toner
ingredients:
Aqua (Distilled Water), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Sodium PCA, Hyaluronic Acid, Ascorbyl Glucoside (Vitamin C), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Squalane (Olive-derived), Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Lipid, Lecithin, Polysorbate 20, Cetearyl Glucoside, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil / Rosa Damascena Oil / Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil [optional fragrance], Dehydroacetic Acid & Benzyl Alcohol (Eco-certified preservative).

100% Vegan | No Parabens | No Silicones | No Sulphates | Cruelty-Free
benefits_brief:
Hydrates Deeply Without Stickiness
Aloe Vera, Hyaluronic Acid, and Sodium PCA quench thirsty skin for an instantly plump, dewy finish.

Brightens & Revives Dull Complexion
Niacinamide, Vitamin C, and Licorice Extract fade dark spots and promote an even skin tone.

Strengthens Skin Barrier
Oat Lipids, Squalane, and Lecithin fortify the natural lipid layer to prevent moisture loss and dryness.

Soothes & Calms Sensitive Skin
Centella Asiatica and Rose Water relieve redness, irritation, and post-sun sensitivity.

Soft, Milky Texture for Everyday Luxury
A silky, semi-translucent finish that melts into skin ‚Äî no greasy residue, just fresh radiance.

Daily Glow Ritual
Use morning and night to keep skin balanced, luminous, and comfortably hydrated throughout the day.

After cleansing (Step 2 of your skincare routine)
Before serum or moisturizer
Suitable for AM & PM use

name: Intense Brightening Elixir Face Serum
ingredients:
Vitamin C (Ethyl Ascorbic Acid 10%)
Niacinamide (5%)
Kojic Acid (2%)
Alpha Arbutin (1%)
Azelaic Acid (2%)
Mandelic Acid (1%)
Licorice Root Extract
Turmeric Extract
Gotu Kola Extract
Green Tea Extract
Hyaluronic Acid
Aloe Vera Juice
Panthenol (Vitamin B5)
Allantoin
Sodium PCA
Glycerin (plant-derived)
Aqua (Distilled Water)
Xanthan Gum (Natural Thickener)
Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin (Eco-certified preservative)
Natural Essential Oils for mild fragrance
benefits_brief:
1. Fades Pigmentation & Dark Spots:
A powerhouse blend of Vitamin C, Kojic Acid, and Alpha Arbutin helps inhibit melanin production, lightening dark spots, sun damage, and acne scars naturally over time.

2. Evens Out Skin Tone:
Niacinamide and Azelaic Acid refine uneven texture and minimize redness, revealing a visibly brighter, smoother, and more uniform complexion.

3. Boosts Radiance & Hydration:
Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera, and Panthenol, this serum deeply hydrates and plumps skin ‚Äî leaving it soft, supple, and glowing.

4. Antioxidant Protection:
Green Tea, Gotu Kola, and Turmeric Extracts protect against pollution, free radicals, and premature aging, promoting youthful, resilient skin.

5. Gentle Skin Renewal:
Mild exfoliation from Mandelic & Azelaic acids helps remove dull, dead cells and promotes cell turnover without irritation, even for sensitive skin.

use_cases:
When to Use:
Day: After cleansing & toning, before moisturizer & SPF.
Night: After cleansing & toning, followed by a night cream or hydrating gel.

How to Use:
Apply 2‚Äì3 drops on clean, damp skin.
Gently pat until absorbed.
Follow with moisturizer or sunscreen (AM).
Use daily, morning & night, for best results.

Storage:
Keep in a cool, dark place, away from direct sunlight to preserve Vitamin C potency.

WHY USERS WILL LOVE IT
This serum combines the power of Ayurvedic herbs with modern actives to deliver visible results without harshness.
It feels lightweight, absorbs quickly, and gives an instant glow with consistent brightening over time.

Loved By:
Those with dull, pigmented, or uneven skin tone
People with acne marks, tanning, or post-inflammatory pigmentation
Anyone seeking a natural, luminous glow

name: Tivra Skin Peeling Oil
ingredients: Jojoba Oil, Olive-derived Squalane, Rosehip Seed Oil, Turmeric Extract, Glycolic Acid (from Sugarcane), Malic Acid (from Apple Extract), Lactic Acid, Licorice Root Extract, Aloe Vera Extract, Vitamin C (Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate), Lemon Peel Oil, Chamomile Essential Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Natural Preservative.
benefits_brief:
‚ú® 1. Natural Exfoliation:
The blend of Glycolic, Malic, and Lactic acids gently removes dead skin cells, unclogs pores, and boosts cell renewal without damaging the skin barrier.

üåø 2. Brightens and Evens Skin Tone:
Licorice, Vitamin C, and Turmeric reduce dark spots, tanning, and hyperpigmentation, giving your skin a radiant glow.

üíß 3. Smooth Texture & Instant Radiance:
Regular use refines texture, reduces bumps and roughness, and gives baby-soft skin.

üåô 4. Restores Glow Naturally:

üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è 5. Calms and Soothes:
Chamomile and Aloe Vera minimize irritation, redness, and post-peel dryness.

use_cases:
When to Use:
üïØÔ∏è Night Only, 1-2 times a week.

How to Use:
Cleanse your skin and pat dry.
Apply 4‚Äì5 drops evenly on face and neck using fingertips.
Leave for 6‚Äì8 hours overnight (do not rinse immediately).
Next morning, wash with mild cleanser and apply sunscreen.

Patch Test:
Always patch test before first use on inner arm or behind ear for 24 hours.

Do Not Use:
On broken or sensitive skin
Directly after waxing or shaving
Alongside other exfoliants or retinoids

Storage:
Store in a cool, dark place away from direct sunlight.

üíõ WHY USERS WILL LOVE IT
This is a gentle, organic alternative to chemical peels ‚Äî designed for visible results without irritation.
Its golden hue, lightweight texture, and natural scent make skincare feel like self-care.

Best For:
Dull or tanned skin
Pigmentation, acne marks, or rough texture
Normal to oily skin types (dry skin can follow with moisturizer)

name: Sunscreen SPF50
ingredients: Aqua (Distilled Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), Niacinamide, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Octocrylene, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane (Avobenzone), Benzophenone-3, BHT, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Gluconolactone (and) Sodium Benzoate (Geogard Ultra), Fragrance (Natural), Lactic Acid (for pH adjustment).
benefits_brief:
‚òÄÔ∏è High Sun Protection
Broad spectrum SPF 50 PA+++ shields skin from UVA/UVB rays, photo-aging, and tanning.
Works well even under makeup and humid conditions.

üíß Hydration Without Stickiness
Aloe Vera, Hyaluronic Acid, and Panthenol lock in moisture and keep skin hydrated all day.

üß¥ No White Cast
The SPF blend and lightweight emulsion ensure it blends seamlessly into all Indian skin tones.

‚ú® Barrier Strengthening

Every morning after cleansing and serum.

name: Intense Body Butter
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Cocoa Butter, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Jojoba Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Aloe Vera Extract, Glycerin, Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Niacinamide, Vitamin E, Phenoxyethanol, Natural Fragrance

The blend of mango butter and fractionated coconut oil ensures quick absorption without a heavy residue.

Barrier Repair & Protection:
Shea butter and panthenol work together to restore the skin‚Äôs lipid barrier, preventing moisture loss.

Skin Brightening & Tone Correction:

Anti-Aging Benefits:
Vitamin E and antioxidants protect the skin from free radicals and early signs of aging.

Soothing & Cooling Effect:
Aloe vera and glycerin soothe inflammation and give a naturally fresh feel, even in humid weather.

name: Rosemary Water Hair Spray
ingredients: (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Glycerin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Caffeine, Biotin, Niacinamide, Hydrolyzed Pea Protein, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Menthol.
benefits_brief:
Stimulates Hair Growth:
‚Ä¢Rosemary extract and caffeine work synergistically to improve microcirculation in the scalp, ensuring better nutrient delivery to follicles.
‚Ä¢Regular use helps awaken dormant follicles and extend the hair‚Äôs growth phase (anagen phase).

Strengthens Hair Shaft:
‚Ä¢Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5) deeply nourishes and coats hair strands, preventing breakage and split ends.
‚Ä¢Biotin supports keratin formation, enhancing hair density and texture over time.

Reduces Hair Fall & Dandruff:
‚Ä¢ Niacinamide and green tea extract reduce scalp inflammation, balance sebum production, and control dandruff-causing microbes.
‚Ä¢ Aloe vera soothes irritation, restoring a healthy scalp environment.

Non-Sticky, Lightweight Finish:
‚Ä¢Water-based formula absorbs instantly without weighing hair down or leaving any residue.
‚Ä¢Perfect for hot and humid climates (like India).

Natural Aroma Therapy:
‚Ä¢Gentle rosemary and mint fragrance provides a refreshing, uplifting feel, leaving hair smelling clean and naturally herbal.

use_cases:
üíß Use Case:
A daily scalp and hair-strengthening mist that stimulates follicles, controls hair fall, and encourages new growth. Ideal for all hair types, including oily and thin hair.

ü™∂ How to Use:

Shake well before use.
Spray directly onto scalp and hair roots.
Gently massage for 1‚Äì2 minutes.
Use twice daily ‚Äî morning and night ‚Äî for best results.
Leave on; no rinse required.
